TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalValueEntry extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示本地设置的依赖属性的属性标识符和属性值。

span.span: Represents a property identifier and the property value for a locally set dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取的属性值时，将返回此类的实例 。Instances of this class are returned when getting the value of the property of a . 所有 属性都是只读的。All properties are read-only. 此类没有公共构造函数。This class has no public constructor. 若要获取此类的实例，必须调用 ，然后从返回的中获取的值 。In order to obtain instances of this class you must call , and then get the value of from the returned . ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问和查询属性的本地设置的值 。The following example iterates locally set values of a and queries properties. [!code-csharp[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/CSharp/default.xaml.cs#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)] [!code-vb[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/VisualBasic/default.xaml.vb#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)]

span.span: Determines whether two instances are equal.

span.span: This implementation compares the values of the , and potentially compares the values of .

returns.span: 的 组件为值类型，因此将始终是按位比较。

span.span: The component of a is a value type, so will always be a bitwise comparison.

returns.span: 对于 组件，如果它是值类型，此实现将使用按位比较。

span.span: For the component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type.

returns.span: 对于具有引用类型的本地设置的属性，该行为将推迟到该类型的相等性确定机制中进行，因为它只在内部为两个值使用 == 运算符。

span.span: For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it just uses the == operator on the two values internally.

returns.span: 默认情况下，这将是值的引用相等性，因而整个 的相等性将变为引用相等性。

span.span: By default, this would be a reference equality of the values and thus the equality of the entire would become a reference equality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 实现比较 的各个值，并可能比较 的各个值。This implementation compares the values of the , and potentially compares the values of . 的 组件始终是 值类型，因此，此比较将始终为按位值比较。The component of a is always a value type, so this comparison will always be a bitwise value comparison. 对于 组件，如果它是值类型，此实现将使用按位比较。For the component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type. 对于具有引用类型的本地设置的属性，该行为将推迟到该类型的相等性确定机制中进行，因为它只在内部为两个值使用 `==` 运算符。For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it uses the `==` operator on the two values internally. 默认情况下，这是值的引用相等性。By default, this is a reference equality of the values.

summary.span: 获取该条目表示的本地设置的依赖项属性的标识符。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以查询本地设置的依赖属性的标识符并获取其元数据。Use this property to query the identifier of the locally set dependency property and to obtain its metadata. 此获取的元数据可能包含属性的初始默认值以及属性是否支持属性值继承。This obtained metadata may include the initial default value of the property and whether the property supports property value inheritance.
